thread.title: Second Theranos Lab Has Blood-Testing License Revoked
thread.title_full: Second Theranos Lab Has Blood-Testing License Revoked - WSJ

author: Christopher Weaver
title: Second Theranos Lab Has Blood-Testing License Revoked
text:
A lab run by blood-testing firm Theranos Inc. in Arizona put patients at risk and failed to quickly fix its deficiencies, a regulator found, triggering a new round of sanctions last month by the U.S. agency against the company.

The Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services imposed its most serious sanctions on the Arizona lab, including a revocation of its U.S. testing license, according to a Jan. 27 letter obtained by The Wall...
